info.description: Bungie's API, only focusing on Destiny-related endpoints for now
info.title: Bungie API (Destiny endpoints only!)

get.description: Returns information about current daily, weekly and special events.

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Returns advisor information about the vendor Xur in Destiny.

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

post.description: Equips an item from a character's inventory. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

parameters.description: The instanceId of an equipable item.
parameters.name: itemId

parameters.description: The character that the item is attached to.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

post.description: Equips multiple items from a character's inventory and returns the updated inventory and character information. The endpoint will fail if the character is logged in and doing an activity.

get.description: Returns a list of currently active events.

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Advanced InventoryItem search.

parameters.description: The number of results to return. Default is 10.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Filter by bucket. Comma separated. (See DestinyExplorerBuckets Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: buckets

parameters.description: Filter by item rarity. (See TierType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: rarity

parameters.description: Filter by item sub type. (See DestinyItemSubType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: subtype

parameters.description: Filter by character class. (See DestinyClass Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: characterClass

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

parameters.description: Ordering. (See DestinyExplorerOrderBy Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: order

parameters.description: Filter by item type. Comma separated. (See DestinyItemType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: types

get.description: Advanced search for TalentNodes.

parameters.description: The number of results per page. Default is 10.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Filter by name.
parameters.name: name

parameters.description: Filter by damage type. (See DamageType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: damageTypes

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

parameters.description: The page offset.
parameters.name: page

get.description: Returns a list of "tiles" used on the Bungie.net website.
Returns the current version of the [[Manifest|manifest]] as a json object.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Manifest%2f</ref>
Returns the specific item from the current manifest a json object.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Manifest%2f%7btype%7d%2f%7bid%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: The hash ID of the definition instance.
parameters.name: definitionId

parameters.description: The type of definition to return. (See DestinyDefinitionType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: definitionType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Returns a list of players by username and platform.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=SearchDestinyPlayer%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdisplayName%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: A valid display name to search for.
parameters.name: displayName

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

post.description: Changes the lock state on an equipable item.
Set the track state of a given quest.

get.description: Gets aggregate historical stats organized around each character for a given account.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2fAccount%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Groups of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated. (See DestinyStatsGroupType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: groups

get.description: Returns recent activity history for a given character.

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: The number of results to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

parameters.description: Game mode to return (Required). (See DestinyActivityModeType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: mode

parameters.description: The page offset.
parameters.name: page

get.description: Gets all activities the character has participated in together with aggregate statistics for those activities.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2fAggregateActivityStats%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f%7bcharacterId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Returns the equivalent of the [[DestinyHistoricalStatsDefinition]] with the statId as the key.
Returns Destiny excellence badges for a given account. No longer in use.<ref>https://www.bungie.net/en/Clan/Post/39966/118496335/0/0/1</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Returns leaderboard stats compared against friends. Note you may need to re-authenticate with PSN/Xbox in order to see full rankings.

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated. (See DestinyActivityModeType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: modes

get.description: Returns leaderboard stats for a given character compared against friends. Note you may need to re-authenticate with PSN/Xbox in order to see full rankings.

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated. (See DestinyActivityModeType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: modes

get.description: Returns leaderboard stats compared against PSN friends. Note, you may need re-authenticate with PSN in order to see full rankings.

parameters.description: Unknown, further testing needed.
parameters.name: code

parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated. (See DestinyActivityModeType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: modes

get.description: Gets the available post game carnage report for the activity ID.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2fPostGameCarnageReport%2f%7bactivityId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: A valid activityInstanceId.
parameters.name: activityId

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Gets details about unique weapon usage, including all exotic weapons.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2fUniqueWeapons%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f%7bcharacterId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description: Returns historical stat information about a given Destiny character.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f%7bcharacterId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid characterId that is associated with the given account.
parameters.name: characterId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: First month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.
parameters.name: monthstart

parameters.description: Last month to return when monthly stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM.
parameters.name: monthend

parameters.description: Game modes to return. Comma separated. (See DestinyActivityModeType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: modes

parameters.description: Group of stats to include, otherwise only general stats are returned. Comma separated. (See DestinyStatsGroupType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: groups

parameters.description: Indicates a specific period type to return. (See PeriodType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: periodtype

parameters.description: Last day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: dayend

parameters.description: First day to return when daily stats are requested. Use the format YYYY-MM-DD.
parameters.name: daystart

post.description: Moves items to and from a character and the vault.

get.description: Returns Grimoire definitions. This is the equivalent pulling the [[GrimoireDefinition]] from the [[Manifest]].<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Vanguard%2fGrimoire%2fDefinition%2f</ref>
Returns the Grimoire for the currently signed in account.

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

parameters.description: Return data for a single cardId.
parameters.name: single

parameters.description: Indicates flavour stats should be included with player card data. More testing needed.
parameters.name: flavour

get.description: Returns the Grimoire for a given account.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Vanguard%2fGrimoire%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bmembershipId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.
parameters.name: destinyMembershipId

parameters.description: A valid non-BungieNet membership type. (See BungieMembershipType Wikia page for more details.)
parameters.name: membershipType

parameters.description: Include definitions in the response; true or false.
parameters.name: definitions

parameters.description: Return data for a single cardId.
parameters.name: single

parameters.description: Indicates flavour stats should be included with player card data. More testing needed.
parameters.name: flavour

get.description: Returns Destiny account information for the supplied membership.<ref>https://www.bungie.net/platform/destiny/help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=%7bmembershipType%7d%2fAccount%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Destiny membership ID.

parameters.description: If False, will not return definition information.
parameters.name: definitions

get.description:
Returns Destiny character information for the given characterId.http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=Stats%2fActivityHistory%2f%7bmembershipType%7d%2f%7bdestinyMembershipId%7d%2f%7bcharacterId%7d%2f

get.description: Returns the numerical id of a player based on their display name, zero if not found.<ref>http://www.bungie.net/platform/Destiny/Help/HelpDetail/GET?uri=%7bmembershipType%7d%2fStats%2fGetMembershipIdByDisplayName%2f%7bdisplayName%7d%2f</ref>

parameters.description: Default is false when not specified. True to cause a caseless search to be used.

cookie.name: Cookie
cookie.description: The following cookie values from bungie.net: 'bungled', 'bungledid', 'bungleatk'

csrf.name: X-CSRF
csrf.description: CSRF token, equal to the 'bungled' cookie from bungie.net
